subject: Missing Haptics
description_text:
Hi, 
 
 i just answered to an email 10 minutes ago but I want to make sure you get this eMail. 
 
 So as i said, I got a package today which included 2 packages. The Baseplate and the pedals itself. 
 
 The two haptics I ordered are not included. Not in an extra package and not in one of the other 2 packages. 
 
 Do they come in an extra package or is this a mistake by you? 
 
 Regards, 
 Rick.
